siteMetadata.title: Paul Waweru
siteMetadata.subtitle: Software Engineer. Passion for travel and food. North London is Red. Navigating through this thing called life.

frontmatter.title: GraphQL - Is this the end of RESTful API's?
frontmatter.description: In this post I embark on a journey through understanding and demystifying GraphQL, and I dis whether this may be a good replacement for traditional RESTFul design. Read and comment!
